premise_source_doc_sentence: George Herman `` Babe '' Ruth Jr.  (  February 6 , 1895 -- August 16 , 1948  )  was an American professional baseball player whose career in Major League Baseball  (  MLB  )  spanned 22 seasons , from 1914 through 1935 .
